content.statement: vascular:diagnostics:dx-013-co2-angiography is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Diagnostics that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

clinical_features.mechanism: Carbon dioxide gas provides negative contrast, eliminated via lungs

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.

clinical_pearls: Completely non-nephrotoxic - invaluable for CKD patients
NEVER use above the diaphragm (risk of cerebral air embolism)
CO2 is buoyant - tilt table to fill dependent vessels
